original_text: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
korean_text: 오직 사랑 안에서 참된 것을 하여 범사에 그에게까지 자랄지라 그는 머리니 곧 그리스도라

sentences.original_text: Instead, speaking the truth in love,
we will grow to become in every respect
mature body of him who is the head,
sentences.korean_translation: 머리이신 그의 온전한 몸이 될 것입니다.
